technician: Gas Pressure Information ​

A gas burner works based on Bernoulli’s Principle. Simply put, the jet of fast-moving gas coming out of the orifice, drags the surrounding air into the burner with it. The venturi effect mixes the air with the gas to create the fuel to air mixture that burns when it comes out of the burner holes.

As you increase in elevation the air begins to thin out, there is less oxygen in the air to burn so the flame on the unit is more gas than it is oxygen, this causes the flame to turn orange and produce soot. To counteract this the holes in the orifices on the unit need to be smaller. This restricts the volume of gas coming out of the orifice without slowing the speed at which it comes out. This allows for more air to mix in the burner venturi to keep the flame blue. ​

​All our units are shipped out with “Sea Level” Orifices in them.It is up to the end user's installer to size the orifices on the unit accordingly when the unit is to be installed at elevation.

technician: cracked Top burner​

customer: If the unit is not working,asking the customer to record a picture and send it to us for analysis.(Make sure to upload it into the system)

Confirm with the customer whether the installation was done correctly?
1.All units​ The gas connection must be made with a ¾” gas connection
2.If it's NG (Natural Gas), take 14” W.C. (1/2 PSI) and regulate it down to the 4” W.C. for NG.
For most natural gas setups the regulator supplied with the unit is sufficient. Verify that the regulator is receiving at least 4” W.C. from the main in the building.

3.If it's LP,take 14” W.C. (1/2 PSI) and regulate it down to the 10” W.C. for LP.
The regulator is Adjustable to either NG or LP depending on the position of the pin under the top cap.​

​
technician:
Pilot Randomly Goes Out
1.Remove the Pilot Orifice and check for debris.
2.Adjust the low flame .​
3.Replace the Thermocouple.

Griddle Top Not Heating Evenly
1.Adjust the low flame​.
2.Verify the gas pressure at the Unit Manifold. Adjust Accordingly​.​
3.Griddle top is Cast Iron. Griddle top will need to be seasoned like a cast iron skillet before first use and if cleaned to bare metal.​

Griddle Top Leaking.
The weld on the griddle top has broken loose and is not repairable. Griddle will need to be replaced.
